roles.name: Admin
roles.description: Manages the community, sets direction, and ensures smooth operations.

roles.name: Moderator
roles.description: Supports admins by moderating content and maintaining community rules.

roles.name: Mentor
roles.description: Guides and shares expertise with other members to help them grow.

roles.name: Contributor
roles.description: Actively creates posts, tutorials, or discussions for the community.

roles.name: Member
roles.description: Regular participant who reads, comments, and engages with content.

roles.name: Newbie
roles.description: New to the community, learning and starting to contribute.

roles.name: Project Leader
roles.description: Leads group projects, organizes collaboration, and drives results.

roles.name: Tester
roles.description: Tests and validates contributions, ensuring quality and reliability.

contribution.name: Top Contributor
contribution.description: Recognized for consistently making valuable contributions.

contribution.name: Helper
contribution.description: Acknowledged for frequently helping other members.

contribution.name: Reviewer
contribution.description: Earned by reviewing and providing feedback on others' work.

contribution.name: Bug Hunter
contribution.description: Given to those who identify and report bugs effectively.

expertise.name: RTOS Master
expertise.description: Expert in real-time operating systems and scheduling.

expertise.name: MCU Guru
expertise.description: Highly skilled in microcontroller programming and design.

expertise.name: Linux Embedded Hacker
expertise.description: Specialist in embedded Linux systems and custom builds.

expertise.name: Debugger Pro
expertise.description: Master at debugging and solving complex system issues.

expertise.name: Hardware Maker
expertise.description: Recognized for designing and building hardware solutions.

expertise.name: Security Specialist
expertise.description: Expert in securing embedded systems against threats.

special.name: Hackathon Winner
special.description: Awarded to winners of hackathons or coding competitions.

special.name: Open Source Contributor
special.description: Acknowledged for contributing to open-source projects.

special.name: Community Builder
special.description: Recognized for fostering collaboration and building community spirit.
